alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 14 at 1:10PM MDT until April 15 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to Heavy Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Lower amounts around a dusting for Shoshoni and northern portions of the basin. Locally higher amounts up to 6 inches are possible where banded snow develops. * WHERE...Wind River Basin, including Riverton. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions in some areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm ground temperatures will limit accumulations on roadways, with some roads likely only having a layer of slush. Snow will fall overnight, so the morning commute will be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
